headline: Is Home Depot (HD) Pricing Reflect Recent Retail Sentiment Swings Accurately
summary: If you are wondering whether Home Depot's current share price reflects fair value or an opportunity, this article will walk through what the numbers actually say. Over shorter periods the stock has moved around, with returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 10.5% over 30 days, 11.8% year to date, and a 6.8% decline over 1 year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 32.8% and 61.7% respectively. Recent news coverage has often focused on Home Depot's role as one of the largest home improvement...
